<<BR>>'''Useful Commands:'''
<<BR>>Network Interface <nowiki>[[https://www.itu.int/rec/dologin.asp?lang=e&id=T-REC-Y.1564-202106-I!Cor1!PDF-E|bit rate testing]]</nowiki> using a server and client hierarchy â€” if the Interface speeds of the End Systems are not equal, do not source UDP from the faster transmit-capable End System.
<<BR>>`iperf3 -s`
<<BR>>`iperf3 -b 0 -f m -l 0 -M 9216 -N -O 0 -P 1 -t 300 -V -w 0 -Z --get-server-output --no-fq-socket-pacing -c `<destination address>` `[`-B` <source address>]` `[`-Ru`]``
<<BR>>Run a shell script on a particular CPU
<<BR>>`getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN`
<<BR>>`taskset -c `<CPU n-1>` ./shell-script`
<<BR>>Run a shell script with Real Time scheduling
<<BR>>`sudo chrt `[`-f` | `-r`]` `<1-99>` sudo -u $USER ./shell-script`
<<BR>>Create a backup of a disk
<<BR>>`blkid && lsblk -f && sudo fdisk -l | grep "Disk /dev/"`
<<BR>>`sudo dd if=`<Disk>` | lzma --best > ./backup`
<<BR>>Restore a backup to a disk
<<BR>>`blkid && lsblk -f && sudo fdisk -l | grep "Disk /dev/"`
<<BR>>`sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=`<Disk>`; unlzma ./backup -c | sudo dd of=`<Disk>``
<<BR>>
<<BR>>'''Useful Daemons:'''
<<BR>>Domain Name System
<<BR>>`sudo apt-get -y install bind9 && ( sudo sed -i 's/RESOLVCONF=no/RESOLVCONF=yes/' /etc/default/bind9 2> /dev/null || sudo sed -i 's/RESOLVCONF=no/RESOLVCONF=yes/' /etc/default/named ) && echo -e "zone dn42 IN { type forward; forward only; forwarders { fd42:d42:d42:54::1; fd42:d42:d42:53::1; 172.20.0.53; 172.23.0.53; }; };" | sudo tee -a /etc/bind/named.conf.local && sudo named-checkconf /etc/bind/named.conf.local  && ( sudo /etc/init.d/bind9 restart 2> /dev/null || sudo /etc/init.d/named restart )`
<<BR>>File Transfer Protocol
<<BR>>`sudo add-apt-repository -uy universe &> /dev/null; sudo apt-get -y install pure-ftpd`
<<BR>>Hypertext Transfer Protocol
<<BR>>`sudo apt-get -y install software-properties-common && sudo add-apt-repository -uy ppa:unit193/cherokee && sudo apt-get -y install cherokee cherokee-admin`
<<BR>>IEEE 802.1AB Link Layer Discovery Protocol
<<BR>>`sudo apt-get -y install lldpd && echo -e "DAEMON_ARGS=\"-l -L /usr/sbin/lldpcli -x\"" | sudo tee -a /etc/default/lldpd && sudo systemctl restart lldpd.service && sudo lldpcli update`
<<BR>>`lldpcli watch`
